query_result.query:
select *, (t1.tdomcre+t2.tcorrcre+t3.thostcre) as Total_hoy, (t1a.tdomcre+t2a.tcorrcre+t3a.thostcre) as Total_sem_pasada
from
  (select count(estado) as tdomcre  
        from servicio 
        where tiposervicio = "dominio" and estado != "create" and DATE_FORMAT(fechaActivacion, '%Y-%m-%d') = CURDATE()) as t1, 
    
  (select sum(cantidad) as tcorrcre  
        from servicio 
        where tiposervicio = "correo" and estado != "create" and DATE_FORMAT(fechaActivacion, '%Y-%m-%d') = CURDATE()) as t2, 

  (select count(estado) as thostcre  
        from servicio 
        where tiposervicio = "hosting" and estado != "create" and DATE_FORMAT(fechaActivacion, '%Y-%m-%d') = CURDATE()) as t3,
        
  (select count(estado) as tdomcre  
        from servicio 
        where tiposervicio = "dominio" and estado != "create" and DATE_FORMAT(fechaActivacion, '%Y-%m-%d') = subdate(CURDATE(),7)) as t1a, 
    
  (select sum(cantidad) as tcorrcre  
        from servicio 
        where tiposervicio = "correo" and estado != "create" and DATE_FORMAT(fechaActivacion, '%Y-%m-%d') = subdate(CURDATE(),7)) as t2a, 

  (select count(estado) as thostcre  
        from servicio 
        where tiposervicio = "hosting" and estado != "create" and DATE_FORMAT(fechaActivacion, '%Y-%m-%d') = subdate(CURDATE(),7)) as t3a;
